required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: SAPIEN 3 Ultra EU Post-Market Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate real-world outcomes for the SAPIEN 3 Ultra Transcatheter Heart Valve System in transcatheter aortic valve implantation centres that are implementing minimalist periprocedural practices and facilitating early discharge home.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective, observational, single-arm, multicentre, post-market study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Discharge, expected to be within 1-5 days post-procedure
primary_outcome.description: Number of days in hospital after the procedure

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who will undergo TAVI with the Edwards SAPIEN 3 Ultra System as part of standard-of-care treatment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Will undergo TAVI with the Edwards SAPIEN 3 Ultra System
2. Less than 80 years of age at time of the procedure
3. Low surgical risk
4. Meets clinical and procedural requirements for early discharge
5. The subject or subject's legal representative has been informed of the nature of the study, agrees to its provisions and has provided written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Medical, social, or psychological conditions that preclude appropriate consent and follow-up, including subjects under guardianship
2. Considered to be part of a vulnerable population
3. Active SARS-CoV-2 infection (Coronavirus-19 [COVID-19]) or previously diagnosed with COVID-19 with sequelae that could confound endpoint assessments
4. Cannot tolerate an anticoagulation/antiplatelet regimen
5. Active bacterial endocarditis
6. Participating in a drug or device study that has not reached its primary endpoint
